div.p: Most illustrious Bullinger, I have received letters from Italy from Lelio, whom I expect daily. He asks me to send you a packet, which you will see attached, and he sends you many greetings. I am sending an Italian booklet published by me and printed in central Italy, in which there is an opportune mention of Bibliander. When I come, I will bring more copies. Farewell and greetings to you with your whole family, school, and church. May the Lord bless your labors.
To the most illustrious man, Lord Heinrich Bullinger, my honorable brother.
